DOC.brief_summary: To verify the occurrence of Spontaneous Otoacoustic Emissions (SOAE) in neonates at term and preterm infants who had transient otoacoustic emissions and verify if the presence of response is related to gestational age, gender or risk factors for hearing loss.
DOC.brief_title: Interrelations Between Spontaneous Otoacoustic Emissions and Transient Evoked Emissions
DOC.criteria: born in this institution have presence of transient otoacoustic emission
